document Class

Defined in: lib/api/document.js:4
Module: document
Parent Module: arango

The api module to perform document related operations on ArangoDB.

  • Index
  • Methods

Item Index

Methods

  • create
  • delete
  • get
  • head
  • list
  • patch
  • put

Methods

create

(
  • [collection]
  • data
  • [options]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/document.js:16

creates a a document in a given collection.

Parameters:

  • [collection] String optional
    • The collection containing the documents.If not provided the collection defined in the connection is used.
  • data Object
    • the data of the document as JSON object
  • [options] Object optional
    • an object with the following optional parameters:
    • [createCollection=false] Boolean optional
      • if set the collection given in "collection" is created as well.
    • [waitForSync=false] Boolean optional
      • Wait until document has been synced to disk.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.

Returns:

Promise:

delete

(
  • id
  • [options]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/document.js:135

Deletes a document

Parameters:

  • id String
    • the document-handle
  • [options] Object optional
    • an object with the following optional parameters:
    • [match] Boolean optional
      • boolean defining if the given revision should match the found document or not.
    • [rev] Number optional
      • String the revision, used by the "match" attribute.
    • [forceUpdate] Boolean optional
      • If set an update is performed even when the given revision does not match.
    • [waitForSync=false] Boolean optional
      • Wait until document has been synced to disk.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.

Returns:

Promise:

Promise:

patch

(
  • id
  • data
  • [options]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/document.js:103

patches a document with the data given in data

Parameters:

  • id String
    • the edge-handle
  • data Object
    • the data of the edge as JSON object
  • [options] Object optional
    • an object with the following optional parameters:
    • [match] Boolean optional
      • defining if the given revision should match the found document or not.
    • [rev] Number optional
      • The revision, used by the "match" attribute.
    • [forceUpdate] Boolean optional
      • If set an update is performed even when the given revision does not match.
    • [waitForSync=false] Boolean optional
      • Wait until document has been synced to disk.
    • [keepNull=true] Boolean optional
      • if set to false a patch request will delete every null value attributes.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.

Returns:

Promise:

put

(
  • id
  • data
  • [options]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/document.js:71

replaces a document with the data given in data.

Parameters:

  • id String
    • the edge-handle
  • data Object
    • the data of the edge as JSON object
  • [options] Object optional
    • an object with the following optional parameters:
    • [match] Boolean optional
      • defining if the given revision should match the found document or not.
    • [rev] Number optional
      • The revision, used by the "match" attribute.
    • [forceUpdate] Boolean optional
      • If set an update is performed even when the given revision does not match.
    • [waitForSync=false] Boolean optional
      • Wait until document has been synced to disk.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.
